infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow the app to access your location while in use.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow the app to always access your location.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow the app to access the camera for capturing photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow the app to access your photo library for uploading images.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Agriculture Durability to access your location in the background.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Agriculture Durability to access your location while the app is in use.
plugins.notificationPermission: Allow Agriculture Durability to send you notifications.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location in the background.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Agriculture Durability to access your photos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Agriculture Durability to save photos.
